overview: This gripping and heartfelt documentary examines the events leading up to the shooting murder of Jamaican entertainer Bogle (aka Mr. Wakka), which apparently took place at a dance-off against John Hype and which was presided over by crooner Beenie Man. Nobody knows exactly what took place, but Bogle's death touched off a series of attacks and counterattacks, eliciting a chorus of cries for peace to reign once again.
title: Bogle: Death of a Dancer
